word: In this visit to Jerusalem, the parents of Jesus wished to bring Him in connection with the great teachers in Israel. . . . An apartment connected with the temple was devoted to a sacred school, after the manner of the schools of the prophets. Here leading rabbis with their pupils assembled, and hither the child Jesus came. Seating Himself at the feet of these grave, learned men, He listened to their instruction.--DA 78 (1898).
